description: black pigment on paper; image of flying dragon, head appearing in middle center behind cresting wave; body of dragon snakes behind wave and disappears into a blackened sky; one claw reaches over wave; smaller cresting wave below dragons head; untranslated characters in LRC; red stamp below characters; circular moon shape in ULC
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Dragon [right of a triptych of Taigong Wang, Dragon, and Carp]
